narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wishes to be a class "B" dealer.  The applicant will send a
check for licensing fee to the Animal Care Office in Raleigh, NC.  
Record keeping requirements were discussed during the time of inspection.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the owner.
